snippet: Raymond Roth was reported missing by his 22-year-old son, touching off an exhaustive search, but his wife says e-mails she found prove he staged it all.
abstract: Case of Raymond Roth, Long Island man who was feared drowned off Jones Beach but who was arrested for speeding in South Carolina days later, takes a new twist; his wife Evana says she had been preparing for his funeral when she found e-mails on their home computer that suggested that his disappearance was all a plot to which his son Jonathan was privy.
lead_paragraph: Raymond Roth was reported missing by his 22-year-old son, touching off an exhaustive search, but his wife says e-mails she found prove he staged it all.

headline.seo: Wife Says Long Island Man Once Feared Drowned Faked His Death
headline.main: Long Island Man Faked His Own Death, Wife Says
headline.print_headline: E-Mails Show Long Island Man Faked His Own Death, Wife Says
